mapper.select:
SELECT TJSK.id, TJSK.type, TJSK.signingKeyCode, TJSK.signingKey, TJSK.createDate, TJSK.duration FROM sec_jwt_signing_key TJSK WHERE
AND TJSK.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_jwt_signing_key ( id, type, signingKeyCode, signingKey, createDate, duration ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{signingKeyCode}, #{signingKey}, #{createDate}, #{duration} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sec_jwt_signing_key WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sec_jwt_signing_key
type = #{type,javaType=java.lang.String},
signingKeyCode = #{signingKeyCode,javaType=java.lang.String},
signingKey = #{signingKey,javaType=java.lang.String},
createDate = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
duration = #{duration,javaType=long},
WHERE ID = #{id}
